articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.title: Spotify, Fortnite maker Epic Games challenge Apple’s App Store changes, again - The Times of India
articles.description: Spotify and Fortnite maker Epic Games, along with over two dozen companies, have written to the European Commission alleging Apple’s lack of compliance with the the Digital Markets Act (DMA).
